amendatorysection.catchline: Community work release and reentry centers; standards; requirements.
amendatorysection.para: The division and the department shall set standards for the appropriate staffing levels of community work release and reentry centers. The division and the department shall require each center to:
(1) Be under the supervision and control of a designated center director approved by the division or the department;
(2) Be adequately staffed twenty-four hours per day, including on weekends and holidays; and
(3) Assign an individual counselor to each committed offender assigned to the center.
